title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - F22A Raptor - using the autopilot
description:
In this video we are going to have a closer look at the autopilot of the F22A raptor fighter jet for MSFS 2020. After setting the max speed we will look at the other options such as setting the altitude, using the vertical speed mode and using the nav and heading mode.

0:00 title screen
0:10 where to find the autopilot screen
0:55 using the auto throttle mode
01:50 using the altitude mode
02:50 using the nav mode
03:38 using the ALT and VS mode
07:10 using the heading mode
09:49 HUD overview
10:30 switching between active NAV modes
11:46 approach mode
